raw_title: COORAY – BHADRANI – Beloved wife of Lakshman –
raw_body: COORAY – BHADRANI – Beloved wife of Lakshman – (Chairman,​ E.H. Cooray & Sons Ltd /​ Lakshman Group),​ loving mother of Roshini,​ mother-in-law of Dinesh Dharmadasa,​ precious grandmother of Diroshan,​ Deelaka & Reshmi,​ daughter of late Mr & Mrs G.L.P. de Silva of Ambalangoda,​ daughter-in-law of late Mr & Mrs E.H. Cooray of Moratuwa. Cortege leaves residence 118,​ Rosmead Place,​ Colombo 7 at 4.30 p.m. on Tuesday,​ 19th December for cremation at 5.30 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Kanatte. (New Crematorium).083679
